whyTrade.title: Why Trade on
whyTrade.subtitle: Skip the 2-3% broker spread. Trade peer-to-peer, trustlessly.

permissionless.title: Decentralized & Permissionless
permissionless.description: No single point of failure, non-custodial, no frozen account risk, trade with anyone peer to peer 24/7.

trustless.title: Fully Trustless & Transparent
trustless.description: No humans to trust. Fairness guaranteed by modern cryptography. Our code is all public and open source. We have nothing to hide from you.

noBrokerFees.title: No Broker Fees
noBrokerFees.description: Users on major P2P platforms like <okx>OKX</okx> suffer 2-3% broker spread. <lyncz>LyncZ</lyncz> offers true peer-to-peer trading with direct settlement between users. You get more value for every exchange.

autoSettlement.title: Automatic Settlement
autoSettlement.description: Minimal friction workflow. No interaction between two sides of exchange. Everything settles automatically.

howItWorks.title: Simple. Fast.
howItWorks.subtitle: See how to exchange crypto using <alipay>Alipay</alipay> on <lyncz>LyncZ</lyncz>

step1.title: Connect & Select
step1.description: Connect your wallet and select an order and amount you want to buy. That amount is then reserved for you in the <lyncz>LyncZ smart contract</lyncz>.

step2.title: Pay via Alipay
step2.description: Pay the seller directly via <alipay>Alipay</alipay> using their payment info. Download your <signed>digitally-signed</signed> <alipay>Alipay</alipay> receipt.

step3.title: Upload & Receive Crypto
step3.description: Upload your receipt. <lyncz>LyncZ smart contract</lyncz> validates the signature on the receipt. Crypto releases to your wallet automatically.

step1.title: Create Offer
step1.description: Set your exchange rate and <alipay>Alipay</alipay> account. Deposit crypto into the <lyncz>LyncZ smart contract</lyncz>.

step2.title: Receive CNY & Auto-Release
step2.description: When a buyer pays you CNY and uploads their <signed>digitally-signed</signed> receipt, the <lyncz>LyncZ smart contract</lyncz> validates it and releases your crypto automatically.
